title: Everything Distracts Me From Studying
description:
Alissa is a nursing school student who can't figure out how to get back to the self-discipline she had before the pandemic. - Dr. Laura: "The height of responsibility is to accomplish what needs to be done despite how you feel."

How has the pandemic affected your self-motivation? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
